NK080(wu)030:1: // rdo rje rgyal mo'i bshags pa bzhugs so //
NK080(wu)030:2: rdo rje rgyal mo bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' //gsang sngags grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma //
NK080(wu)030:3: yon tan mang pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
NK080(wu)030:4: gang la yid kyis dmigs te bstod phyag 'tshal //
NK080(wu)030:5: bdag rmongs khyed kyi rigs rgyu ma 'tshal te //
NK080(wu)030:6: mnyes par bgyi ba brtson pas ma bstan kyang //
NK080(wu)030:7: sngon gyi thugs dam 'brel bas bdag bzung ste //
NK080(wu)030:8: sku gsum sgyu mar bstan pa bka' drin che //
NK080(wu)030:9: pad+ma r+aa ga me tog dmar 'dra'i sku //
NK080(wu)030:10: ral pa dmar po thor tshugs cod pan can //
NK080(wu)030:11: phyag gnyis phyag rgya mtshan ldan bzhugs pa yi //
NK080(wu)030:12: yid bzhin re skong khyed la phyag 'tshal stod //
NK080(wu)030:13: dus ngan snying ma'i gnas 'dir bdag skyes te //
NK080(wu)030:14: sdug bsngal mang pos lus sems gdung pa la //
NK080(wu)030:15: yun gyi dpal dang mgon du gsol 'debs na //
NK080(wu)030:16: lha mo mthu chen bdag la rtag tu dgongs //
NK080(wu)030:17: nad dang sdug bsngal 'dre bgegs la sogs rnams //
NK080(wu)030:18: rdo rje rgyal mos ma lus yongs bsal nas //
NK080(wu)030:19: bla med byang chub myur du thob par mdzod //
NK080(wu)030:20: tshe rabs kun tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen mched //
NK080(wu)030:21: nyon mongs bag med dbang du gyur pa yis //
NK080(wu)030:22: dam tshig nyams shing thugs dang 'gal gyur kyang //
NK080(wu)030:23: byang chub sems dang yi dam mi spang na //
NK080(wu)030:24: lha mo khyod kyi tshangs par stsal nas su //
NK080(wu)030:25: ye shes 'phrul gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
